Bible Reading Tracker

Published on January 1, 2026 | By JW

Ring in the New Year with a renewed commitment to the spiritual discipline of Bible reading! I've created a Bible Reading Tracker to help you stay organized and motivated throughout the year. This Excel spreadsheet allows you to plan your reading schedule, track your progress, and reflect on your insights as you journey through Scripture.
